com.camerontec.catalys.server.breakout.policyengine

Interface IBreakOutPolicyEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBreakoutPolicyEngine, ExampleBreakOutPolicyEngine

    public interface IBreakOutPolicyEngine
    A engine that makes policy decisions for a BreakOutBox .

    The policy decisions made by the engine are:

    1. Is a incoming message related to one that is already in the box? And, if so:
      1. Should the new message be broken out?
      2. Should the message processor stop processing the message?
      3. Should a response message be sent?
      4. Should a message that is already in the box be removed?
    2. When an message is added:
      1. Should a response message be sent?
      2. Should a message that is already in the box be removed?

    The engine is also informed when a message is removed from the box and when a message is recovered, it can use these events to keep it's internal data structures up to date.

    Author:
    Hugh Emberson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RelatedMessagePolicyAction determineRelatedMessageAction(IFIXMessageProcessor source, IFIXMessage mess)
      Determine if a message related to another message in the BreakOutBox and return a RelatedMessagePolicyAction object that tells the BreakoutBox what to do.
      MessageAddedPolicyAction onMessageAdded(BrokenOutMessageData data)
      Called when a message has been broken out, update the engines internal data structures.
      void onMessageRecovered(BrokenOutMessageData data)
      Called when a message is recovered update the internal data structures.
      void onMessageRemoved(BrokenOutMessageData data)
      A broken out message has been dealt with, update the engines internal data structures.

    • Method Detail

      • onMessageAdded

        MessageAddedPolicyAction onMessageAdded(BrokenOutMessageData data)
                                 throws MessageException
        Called when a message has been broken out, update the engines internal data structures.
        Parameters:
        data - the message and related data
        Returns:
        a MessageAddedPolicyAction with in which responseMessage and BasePolicyAction.getMessageToRemove() may be set. will not be set.
        Throws:
        MessageException - TBD

      • onMessageRemoved

        void onMessageRemoved(BrokenOutMessageData data)
               throws MessageException
        A broken out message has been dealt with, update the engines internal data structures. Note that the disposition filed must not be BrokenOutMessageData.DISPOSITION_NONE
        Parameters:
        data - the message and related data
        Throws:
        MessageException - TBD

      • determineRelatedMessageAction

        RelatedMessagePolicyAction determineRelatedMessageAction(IFIXMessageProcessor source,
                                                         IFIXMessage mess)
                                                  throws MessageException
        Determine if a message related to another message in the BreakOutBox and return a RelatedMessagePolicyAction object that tells the BreakoutBox what to do.
        Parameters:
        source - the message source
        mess - the message
        Returns:
        a RelatedMessagePolicyAction in which responseMessage and messageToRemove may be set. stopProcessing will be true iff the given message is related to a message that is already in the box. breakOut will be true if the given message is to be broken out.
        Throws:
        MessageException - TBD

      • onMessageRecovered

        void onMessageRecovered(BrokenOutMessageData data)
                 throws MessageException
        Called when a message is recovered update the internal data structures.
        Parameters:
        data - a broken out message
        Throws:
        MessageException - TBD
